website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy and stylish bookcase that assembles in under a half-hour.
pros: Available in espresso, warm brown, or white finishes
Stylish look and a sturdy 6 feet tall
cons: Some reports of this bookcase arriving missing hardware or with misaligned pre-drilled holes
Some issues with the legs not all being even, resulting in a wobbly bookcase

customer_reviews.title: This shelf was way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was way better than expected! The wood is beautiful quality and color! It took about 15 minutes to put together with no issues at all! I had originally purchased one similar from Pier One for $250, I didn't realize I would need two and did not want to pay $250 for another so I have been on the hunt for an identical one ever since! The one on the right is the Pier One shelf and the one on the left is the Amazon one! And they look basically identical! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Waller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my planters!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and sturdy! I'm using this for growing herbs in the window, and it really works well with the tiers of different lengths -- a little bit more sunlight for each level. My 23.5" planters squeeze in perfectly. The shelves can definitely support a good amount of weight, which I was concerned about before buying. Would absolutely buy again, and I just might!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Wrote a previous negative review thinking the screws didn’t fit well but I bought a second shelf to match the first and I am embarrassed to say, the issue with the first was user error :/ With that said, I had to update my review to let everyone know I love these shelves! Sturdy and stylish. Definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SHELF
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS SHELF! Shipping took a little while but was expected, wonderfully packaged, easy to assemble but on one part a pre-drilled hole was missing, easy fix for my husband. The only other thing was after attaching back brackets it creates a gap in the top and bottom pieces but once you load the shelves full of stuff it weighs the gap back closed. I do still definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Upon Grace

customer_reviews.title: It would be very cute IF I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be very cute IF I was able to correctly assemble it. The shelf is two parts and they are attached by holes and pegs where the top piece rests on the bottom piece. My shelf ladder bookcase only had TWO of the FOUR holes hollowed out but came with all 4 pegs. Because I am not able to put pegs in and line them up with their corresponding holes the upper half of the ladder shelf sets off to the side of the bottom shelf. It is also missing ONE pre drilled hole for the screw on the side of the boards. I am unable to contact the company but really wish to tell them about these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Billehus

customer_reviews.title: Great buy/ beautiful shelves!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! The warm brown option was a beautiful rich wood color, very sturdy and easy to put together. Two sections didn’t quite match up and the metal brackets that keep the two pieces together on the back were a smidge too wide compared to the leg and another I just couldn’t install because the connection was very off. However, I knew this going in from other reviews and so still think it is money well spent. I am positive no one will notice those imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Ahna

customer_reviews.title: Crooked board so it leans! Awful.
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was super easy to put together. Unfortunately, one of the boards is crooked so the entire top half of the bookcase leans to the right. It’s absolutely awful! All the pieces looked great when I opened the box so of course, I sent the box to the recycling. Now I can’t send it back but this has to come down. I can’t take looking at it crooked. Really disappointed. And here’s another funny thing, I ordered two and this one came first so I’ll be getting ANOTHER one on Friday. I have no use for just (supposed to be a set) one so I will send that one back unopened and trash this one. Ugh...
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Great at a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It is a great piece at this price point and was super easy to put together. It came with everything needed (except a screw driver) and took me about 20 mins. It seems to be very high quality and sturdy and looks great in my living room. The only word of caution is once you connect the top & bottom sections, be careful moving it as the two pieces are only secured in the back. I tried to pick up the whole unit from the top section to move it and the front started to come apart :). I would definitely recommend this or purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Bookshelf as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Item came in great condition. Assembled my self in 20 mins. Dark color is fine. Only issue was that the shelf is in 2 segments, top and bottom and is a little flimsy when moving to room. It is also a nice tall shelf! Ordering a second one for another room!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burghardt

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the weight and quality of the wood! Fully expected particle board since it was only $50!! Was pretty easy to assemble and was able to do it alone in about 10 minutes. Minor flaws : top half of shelf doesn’t fully connect to bottom half (see pic 2) and connectors in back don’t fit perfectly in pre-screwed holes (see pic 3). Probably an easy enough fix, but didn’t feel like screwing new holes. Overall, super beautiful and much taller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kierra

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost, not highest quality
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect condition. Took about 30 minutes to assemble. Three of the 20 screw heads were soft and the hex key caused them to no longer screw in. I ended up having to use a wrench to screw those three in as far as possible. The pre-drilled screw holes for the small plates that secure the top & bottom pieces together on the back side did not align with the plate holes, so I ended up having to drill my own holes for that. Ultimately, I got what I paid for and feel it was a pretty good deal for $50.
customer_reviews.author: allvol4life

customer_reviews.title: but any wood glue like tightbond will do)
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive standalone shelf...I'm using it for plants. Instead of using the metal brackets to join the top and bottom pieces, I lightly sanded the join area, and used wood glue (gorrilla glue, but any wood glue like tightbond will do). This makes for a cleaner, albeit, permanent, join (which is what I wanted). I also coated the shelf surfaces with water-proof water-based polyurethane...since I intend to put plants on them...it worked perfectly. Only thing I would add for the manufacturer...include screw cap covers so the finished product doesn't have exposed screw heads. I bought some at Home Depot which makes the whole thing look much nicer. Overall, for the price, this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jetslacker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, exactly what I thought it was. Good product
customer_reviews.text: I was able to unpack and assemble this in 20 minutes. Fit together just fine. I did wait to tight the last side up once I had upright in the position it sits. I wiggled and pressed down and tightened it up and everything fit good and it is pretty stable for this type of shelf. Happy. Delivery was on time and really didn't need instructions other than to know what the two types of brackets were for and the correct screws for them. The shelves all used the big screws with the hex head so it was straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: CAD Junky

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shelf! Using in Dining Room
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf. I'm using it in the dining room to hold all of our plates and serveware. It is REAL wood and has a lovely finish on it. I purchased the warm brown finish. It was a little wobbly standing up, but not unsturdy. We have a cat at home so just in case they decided to jump on this, I attached it to the wall with the equipment they gave. It's not going anywhere now. It's so nice and looks like it should be much more expensive. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Real Wood! Exactly as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: Very simple and easy to put together. We were very careful not to tighten the screws too much due to some reviews having issues with splitting the wood on the shelves. With that being said, it came with all it's hardware and the holes matched up perfectly as well as being the correct size. The paint has a medium to strong scent. I purchased the white one. I put mine on the back porch to let it air out but in a few days it should be ready to bring inside. It has the same scent as a freshly painted house/room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Medows

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality shelf for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is so great and exactly what I was looking for. Not only is the price amazing, so is the quality. I was originally saving for a shelf almost identical to this from The Container Store and they wanted $250 for it. This shelf was easy to put together and took me about 30 minutes to assemble by myself. For the price, it is sturdy and holding up great! I love that that the bottom is high enough from the floor so that my robot can get under it. Not to mention look at how gorgeous my plant shelf came out!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Romero

customer_reviews.title: Good for a kids room
customer_reviews.text: They're decent quality and lightweight so easy to assemble in one spot then move to another. The cut was a little uneven where the top part joined to the bottom, so I would have appreciated if they came with a couple more metal plates, and some anti-scratch pads would have been nice to include. Other than that these are good shelves for a kids room, once they're old enough to know not to climb them.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Diggie

customer_reviews.title: Decent shelf
customer_reviews.text: The shelf has some minor defects and blemishes. Looks pretty good put together. Packaging of the shelf was secure, however it left a wierd fiberglass like residue on the parts. Took 15 minutes to vac it off. Overall the assembly is relatively straightforward. It was difficult to tell which side was up on the shelves, I think I put one on upside down. The packaging of the hardware could be better, they just throw it all in a bag and let you sort it out for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Davis

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was between this and some smaller ladder shelves listed on here, but noticed these seemed a little sturdier and had better reviews. Over all, these shelves are great! They’re beautiful and I look forward to finishing my tidying journey where I will finish organizing the contents ON the shelves. Lol. Seriously though, I love them. They make my living room feel much more open. These are optimal for small spaces and easy enough to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Christiana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design, nice wood!
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with these for the price! I bought two, and they were so quick and easy to set up. I noticed other reviewers mentioned there were holes that were not drilled, but that was not an issue for me. Maybe they fixed some QA issues recently! These are very handsome shelves, real wood, and the screws you use to assemble them are pretty hefty. They feel secure, and they have tons of room between all the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: great shelves, warm brown is a good color, real wood, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I had my super assemble two of these for me, and it only took him 45 min. Would probably take the average handyman longer. Love the warm brown color. They are real wood, not particle board - sturdy and attractive. Based on reviews, I don't plan to attach them to the wall, just weight them evenly with books, beginning at the bottom. They're a little smaller than what I had before, so I'm glad I bought two. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence based on some of the reviews of this product. However, my product arrived with no issues. The packaging was excellent, instructions clear, the assembly was a breeze (less than 15 min.), and the quality of the product was much better than expected. My only dislike is the fact that you can see the screws from the side of the unit. However, more expensive options at Hobby Lobby and Lowes had the same design and were much lower quality than this one. I highly recommend this product to anyone who is wanting a good quality ladder shelf at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: acan4043

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Made of solid wood I really like the design idea. Cons: First one wouldn't stand straight as the pre-drilled holes were misaligned. After stating that to amazon, I got send another one, which had several chips on the shelfs and also some misaligned holes. Ended up making one standing one with not too many visible damage out of the two I then had. It was a lot of work. It would be a wonderful shelf if just the quality was better.
customer_reviews.author: rueblig

customer_reviews.title: Cute little Bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for small spaces. It was super easy to put together and quite sturdy. I love how it’s small enough to fit in nooks by windows, which is what I was looking for. Going to purchase another one for my living room. The only con is that the wood does give off a weird odor. I’ve had it for a month and it’s still noticeable when I’m next to it. Hopefully it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: Chelly

customer_reviews.title: Quality is hit or miss.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one so much I bought a second... and this one was not the same quality. The pegs that help secure the top and bottom sections are not aligned properly so there are gaps and I can't screw the plates to the back to keep the pieces together because nothing lines up properly. Still pretty, and it'll work for now. But not worth $80.00. If this had been the first instead of second I would have returned and gone with another shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Marie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Fit; So-So Finish; Wobbles are a Deal-Breaker
customer_reviews.text: Pros * Super-easy to assemble Cons: * One leg uneven leading to significant wobble * Top and bottom halves have uneven fit, aren't solidly attached * Finish has some irregularities I couldn't justify keeping an item of this quality at the $80 price point. Look for a similar item by Sauder that's much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff M.

customer_reviews.title: Put The Bottom Together First!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yeah well it’s really nice but the top part only goes one way and if you put IT together first you’ll never figure out what the hell that means. In addition the overall crookedness of the piece didn’t really resolve itself until the last screw was in. It’s a weird finicky thing but if you lay everything out then put the bottom part together first you should be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angeles Swinger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shelf, Packaging was Great!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is simple and easy to put together. I was very satisfied with the packaging that our shelf arrived in. I'm always concerned when ordering items like these because they typically end up getting damaged on their journey to Hawaii. However, this shelf arrived completely undamaged. Definitely would recommend and would buy again if we needed another!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is much more sturdy than I expected it to be. It's quite tall. A few inches taller than me, and I stand at 5'5". It's a bit tricky to put together alone, but definitely doable. It's a pretty white wood, rather than the cheap glossy material that a lot of furniture uses. The only downfall is that there were a few cosmetic flaws and dents. They're small enough that I don't care enough to return it, but I can see how it would bother some people. Other than that, it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: idontknow

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this ladder style bookcase! It fits perfectly in our master bedroom. The measurements and color are accurate. I love the brass screws because they add a pop of contrast. Simple to put together. Only took me about 15-20 mins from unboxing to finish. Instructions were easy to follow and almost everything needed was included. Just had to grab and Phillips head screwdriver to finish it off.
customer_reviews.author: I. Vollaire

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive and just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive shelf unit. The shelves do have a top side and bottom side so be wary of that when you assemble. I realized after I had assembled that two of my shelves are on upside down. There’s not a huge difference so I just let it go, but one side is finished nicer than the other. I would definitely recommend this shelf unit and buy it again if I wanted another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Modern
customer_reviews.text: I'm a female. Assembled in 20 minute's, no issues. Beautiful Wood, not cheap looking. Stable, does not wobble. Exactly what I was looking for. Arrived in great condition, no damages. Instructions clear and easy to understand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but okay
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, does not come in 2 million pieces - thankfully. Instructions do not specify that there are little grooves on the outside of side bars for screws to nestle in once screwed in all the way (which is good.) My item is espresso in color, but the screws are a bright gold color (which isn't so good.) Also, once fully assembled, I notice there is a tiny gap between the upper and lower portions (also not good.) These things aren't major, just a heads-up.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi L

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm always nervous buying furniture sight unseen but for the price I thought I'd give it a try. As you can see from the five stars - I love it. It came in perfect condition and all the pieces (not a gimme). My husband put it together for me in about 30 minutes. It was easy to fill up the shelves and note that there is plenty of room for pictures, art, plants, etc. I'm trying to find another spot in my house to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is great for the price! Sturdy, easy to assemble, SOLID WOOD! I like the color and shelf space is ample. Many reviews state holes don’t line up perfectly, but that is understandable (this is not a custom piece!) and you have to be patient to get things to line up. I am over 60 and did it myself. Not sure about those who say it is flmsy. It is not unless you expect it to be a real “ladder”. It is not. It is a shelf. Also a positive is it shipped faster than stated. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NWMac

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf but not the sturdiest
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this shelf, but with an important caveat - it doesn't fit together like it should. The top and bottom sections are slightly off on one side. A couple of other reviews mentioned this, too. It's fine, isn't really noticeable and works for me, but I wouldn't put heavier things on it. Like I said, still recommended. It looks great (looks more expensive than it was), the assembly was pretty easy to figure out, and it really elevates my living room.
customer_reviews.author: In Massachusetts

customer_reviews.title: easy assemby- mine had an imperfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a neat, compact box. Assembly instructions were great. Easy to put together. However the top and bottom sections didn't want to line up completely. One of the long, narrow side rails seemed to be warped. My fix was to place add an additional small tie strap + 2 screws on the side of two rails. I chose the inside. Painted that part black to minimize its visual impact but ya can see it if yer lookin'.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Jr in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I a bit worried when I ordered this because of some of the reviews I read. But I took a chance and I'm glad I'm did!! I worked perfectly for what I needed if for. I'm actually thinking about ordering another one. Putting it together was pretty easy and the instructions were easy enough to follow. I had a little helper(kid), but if you needed to assemble this yourself, you would be okay doing so. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! It came in about a week. The color is beautiful and I put it together by myself in about 20 minuets. I thought the shelves were crooked but after I got it completely put together it turned out great. Only thing that I can say is that I had to pull out the electric screw driver thingy (obviously I'm a novice with these home improvement things. So if I can do it so can you!
customer_reviews.author: axrue

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, modern and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When trying to furnish my office that has a very girly appeal it was hard to narrow down what I wanted to put in that room. When I found this one I had a feeling this would be the perfect touch as it’s both modern and can be decorated anyway you would like. After putting it together I realized it was made a very good material and it is something I would purchase again. Haley
customer_reviews.author: Haley Fox Blog

customer_reviews.title: I like this shelf and bought one although I needed 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this shelf and bought one although I needed 4 to create a mini library. It is a little wobbly but looks quite nice and is real wood and held all my books. I would have given it 4 stars but I went back to get 3 more and the price went from $88 to $127. So I did a search and found it at Totally Furniture for $65 plus $10 shipping. It is a nice shelf but most definitely not worth the jacked up price. And the other colors it comes in remained reasonable and significantly less.
customer_reviews.author: Dee2

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Got two for my living room. I will warn you to be careful which size of the shelves you use. I made the mistake of not paying much attention so some are flipped the wrong way where the bottom is the top part. Too lazy to flip them but there is a difference if you are paying attention to it. Otherwise easy to put together and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and great quality
customer_reviews.text: After reading some reviews i was nervous something was going to be wrong when the bookcase arrived. But i was quite pleased with this purchase. I Assembled this bookcase by myself and it only took 30 minutes. The instructions were straight foward and the hardware was provided without any missing pieces. So far it appears to be sturdy and not wobbly ( I did not use the anti tipping pieces). I am very satisfied and recomend this product! UPDATE. Ordered a 2nd bookcase It was easy to assemble by myself but it was missing the metal plates to complete the bookcase. Other than the missing pieces the bookcase looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is actually really easy to put together, far better than other stuff I have bought off of Amazon to self assemble. It is light and not the sturdiest thing I have ever seen, but it will work. I just have picture frames on it, I don't know that I would put anything much heavier without attaching the whole thing to the wall, which you can do. It was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: kdramaclub

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised with quality!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this shelf! I needed a last minute, portable display for a vendor event, so I ordered this and it arrived in about 36 hours. I assembled it in under 20 minutes. I left the two halves separate for transport in the back of my SUV and simply stacked them, with the provided pegs, at the event. It was set up on grass in a fairly breezy area and never wobbled at all. Highly recommend! It is worth noting that the espresso color is really dark, almost black, but it looked great for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: tjackson

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for a shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was a little worried after reading some of the reviews for the shelf, I'm glad I made the purchase. Not only does it fit perfectly in the space I bought it for, it sits firm without having to screw it into the wall. The assembly was hassle-free and quick. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: Cool modern bookcase!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bookcase, exactly what I was looking for. Was shooting for one I saw on pottery barn but didn't want to pay that much and this could be identical! Although I had my husband and his power tools, it was simple to put together. He put it together a little too fast before noticing there is a definite top and bottom of the board so pay attention to the grain but very beautiful once we flipped a couple boards over!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Dont read the bad reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitate on purchasing this for my new home because of the bad reviews. Some said it was missing pissing, holes didn't match up, etc. DON'T LISTEN. Its beautiful! It doesn't look cheap at all! great price for this, other places want 200-300 for this and this one does the job and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great. My only complaint is that when you put the two pieces together only the back side screws in, leaving the front able to wiggle . Since I have it propped up against the wall it's not too big a deal, and I haven't had an issue since I installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley H.

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for any home
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I have a small house so I needed something to put in my corner without obstructing a light switch. It worked perfect! The color was beautiful but my house is a log cabin so I have too much wood as it is. I actually painted over it with gray chalk paint it looks great. The paint stayed and doesn't scratch off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all.
customer_reviews.text: I needed something with a lot of shelves that would fit all my Pop Figures and video games. It matches the dark wood furniture throughout my apartment. It didn't take too long to assembly, maybe 10-15 minutes max. I haven't had many problems with it for the last couple of months. Think its a great investment, for what it does, and it looks pretty stylish to me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kyei-Baffour

customer_reviews.title: Lovely piece, front arms will need brackets
customer_reviews.text: Really nice piece. I think it will provide style and functionality to our bedroom. It’s decently sturdy, but I will have to bracket the front arms together for extra sturdiness as they come out of placement (the unit will come with 2 sets of brackets- back arms and to tether to the wall). Looks and style = 5 stars Assembly time = 5 stars (took <30 mins) Sturdiness = 4 stars due to the front arms bracketing issue
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!
customer_reviews.text: It was inexpensive, easy to put together, and seems sturdy. Ours is in the bathroom, so it's holding towels and a few bins with random stuff - nothing particularly heavy. But I'm considering buying this in another color to put elsewhere in the house that will get more traffic and heavier objects, and I think it would work fine. It does come with the anti-tip hardware, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Navarro

customer_reviews.title: My favorite piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this shelf. The only reason I docked a star is that the finish was a bit inconsistent on some of the paneling, and they don't give you any caps to hide the screws! It looks a little tacky from the side when you can see 10 huge gold bolt heads sticking out like a sore thumb. Beyond that it's perfect
customer_reviews.author: Joey Moody

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Taller and wider than I thought it would be for the price and I’m so glad I got it! It’s beautiful. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Wittekind

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: In world of particle board this is a rare find. It's real wood and quite sturdy. It's heavy enough not to fall apart yet not too heavy to lift by myself. It took me 20 minutes to assemble. The warm brown color is true to the photo. The only recommendation I have is 2 additional flat brackets to the front of the shelf to secure the top and bottom parts as the shelf came with flat brackets for the back. I got this under $73 on Amazon with prime shipping so it is a definite bargain.
customer_reviews.author: S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and quality wood
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality wood material. I gave it 4 stars because the top and bottom doesn’t perfectly align so it doesn’t sit evenly as stated in a lot of other reviews. It’s hardly noticeable but knowing bugs me haha. Not for the OCD. The holes for the screw also doesn’t aligned perfectly with the frame when screwing so the whole time I cringed putting the screws in because it would make a cracking sound like it was going to break due to having to force the screws to fit. Other than that, I’m in love with the appearance and sturdiness. I got a lot of compliments on photos I posted on IG. #plantshelfie
customer_reviews.author: Mal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is functional at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: We recently had our water main pipe re-routed through a wall in our finished basement. We wanted to hide the pipe, while still having easy access to the shut-off valve. This ladder bookcase was perfect for our needs. It looks great, provides shelving for framed photos and holiday decor, and really does not take up a lot of space. I still plan to add a couple Devil's Ivy plants to finish the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Krauklis

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my eye on this for a while and finally buckled down and got and I’m so glad I did! Got an awesome deal by purchasing this at Like New and couldn’t tell that it was even ever opened. The height is perfect and very easy to assemble. The only complaint I have which is small is the stickers didn’t peel off easily but it’s on the sides so doesn’t show and they’re tiny anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Shauntel

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little shelf. I bought it to hold some smaller plants and knick knacks. Easy to assemble, just takes a little bit of time and read the directions! I do not have mine fastened to the wall. It looks very nice and I'm sure will match multiple room decors. I would definitely purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Stone

customer_reviews.title: super easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: these shelves are great for decorative items as well as books. i got the brown ones and it looks great. very very easy to assemble. comes with everything you need (Allen wrench, screws). it is assembles in two pieces so if you want to make it sturdier, you can attach them with the included bracket and screws, but you will need a screwdriver. otherwise you could even use the two pieces separately for little shelves under a window maybe. love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen C.

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty awesome shelf
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty awesome shelf. That being said I knocked it down a star because it’s definately not the most sturdy. I don’t have kids or anything so I’m not worried about it getting knocked over. But if you had kids I don’t know if it would be the most durable and safe furniture to have access to. It looks pretty though! I’m pleasantly surprised. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: The Rambling Raccoon

customer_reviews.title: I adore this shelf!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shelf to put in front of my window and grow herbs on, as my bedroom window is one of the brightest sun-spots in my apartment. It really worked out great for what it was needed for. Not too hard to put together. The overall product was really nice & sturdy. Lots of room on ALL of the shelves for plenty combinations of books, decor and plants. An added bonus--it allows me more privacy in my bedroom area, even with the curtain open, with all the stuff on it. Makes it harder for people to see-in, but still we get plenty of light. Great purchase for the price. Really adds to the room.
customer_reviews.author: JesseBeans

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars if all the parts where included.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice shelf that was an easy build. It looks great. I can’t give it but 1 star for sturdiness because the two metal support pieces that are needed for sturdiness was not included. Also it would have been 5 stars overall if included. L brackets for wall stud brace was included.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: It's ok should be cheaper for the quality
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty however its cheaply made the wood is light, there are no covers for the screws so you just see these silver bolts in the blackness, the inlay holes are all different depths so some go in farther than others one of them isnt deep enough so it sticks out, the top part isnt flush with the bottom so you can see a little section between where they connect and no amount of pressure will make it stay in place, the top and bottom are also locked in place by a gold bracket screwed in the back. It sure is no ikea.
customer_reviews.author: crystal l.

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The overall aesthetic of this ladder bookshelf is impressive for the price. I have two issues with it: First, it is very flimsy and secondly, even after 3 months of install; my room can still smell like paint or chemical coming out of the bookcase. I wouldn't recommend overall.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, build quality is ok
customer_reviews.text: Shelf generally good, instructions are easy to follow. Once assembled and secured to a wall, it was pretty sturdy. Fit and finish though is just ok. I would NOT want this unsecured in my home especially around kids. I'd rate the build quality to be lower than Ikea furniture, but for my purposes that's ok. Will likely by another just to have a matching set
customer_reviews.author: thiscaristooslow

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough for me to put together alone but probably would have been much quicker with another set of hands. All the sides are finished so it’s not fussy with the instructions. Very sturdy and looks great. I would definitely buy it again the next time I need extra storage.
customer_reviews.author: Keyra Scott

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble BUT not sturdy and not good quality
customer_reviews.text: It took me 15 mins to assemble but the shelf is not sturdy at all and the top two shelves are tilted because they were made to align well with the bottom two shelves. Very disappointed. I thought the shelves would look nice but the tilted top shelves made it hard to look good.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: A little quirky, but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than I anticipated. The bookcase comes in two parts-the bottom is the first three shelves and the top is the top two, and they fit together on pegs. The only con I've found is that when I screwed the plates that keep the halves together on the back (they're very small) into the pre-drilled holes, the front two popped up a little. The plate on one side was also tilted due to the placement of the holes, and is visible from the side, poking out. For the price, it's the perfect bookcase for decor/plants/baskets, and the finish is nice-not particle-board/MDF (or at least looks like real wood).
customer_reviews.author: Hannah R.

customer_reviews.title: Simple and classy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great shelf for its price. If you want a heavier shelf, then I would recommend looking for another shelf. But if you’re content with a simple, clean shelf then this would be perfect. I love it. I got the white shelf and it looks classy. The only challenge is that you have to assemble it using an Allen wrench which just takes a little patience.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Sleek wood shelving unit!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shelving unit. The color I chose is as described, warm brown. It is sturdy and looks more expensive. The top two shelves have fasteners to connect to the bottom 3 shelves, but I used wood glue and it has smooth look (see pic). I recommend its wood quality (all wood/ not composite), elegant/sleek design, and great price! Highly satisfied with the overall look, design and structure.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Dowel issue
customer_reviews.text: Right when I opened it I could tell the dowels hadn’t been drilled correctly. They attach the top portion to the bottom, and I can force it on there, but they are glued already which makes it impossible to correct. Might have just gotten a bad one, but a machined item makes me suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Does the job; with a bit of a wobble
customer_reviews.text: As most people claim, this shelf unit is easy and quick to assemble. Not 100% sturdy, closer to 80% in my opinion. Did notice that some pieces didn't smoothly fit but for the most part it all did. Overall great minimalistic piece. Side note: Not sure if it's good for small rooms; my room is pretty big for Manhattan standards.
customer_reviews.author: YasYasYas

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelving unit
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a shelf to add visual height and storage to a blank wall without adding bulk. I wouldn't want to use it for heavy weight storage, but this is perfect for what I needed. Easy to assemble - made my 13 yr old put it together.
customer_reviews.author: campingirl

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL SHELVING UNIT
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy, nicely finished wood shelving unit that was exactly perfect for the spot that I needed it for. I am a senior and I was easily able to assemble this completely by myself in less than an hour. I bought it to hold my WiFi equipment (on the bottom shelf) and I will soon be decorating the other shelves. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sululu

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these shelves to just have a space for some small little items that I just cant seem to part with. It came much sooner than expected. Very well packaged and SO EASY to put together. Thank you !!! I may even buy another one :)
customer_reviews.author: N Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition
customer_reviews.text: We happen to have part of a wall that's exactly as wide as the bookcase, it really looks great here. Nice height, super easy to put together, less than half an hour, only an Allen wrench needed, which is included. Espresso looks great. There were no physical or aesthetic defects. Highly recommend. Shipping was fast as well. Right price, nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: H Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. Unfortunately, the top doesn't sit perfectly on the bottom piece. There is a plate and screws that "secure" it from behind so it isn't visible. But thats not enough. The front can pop right off.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Robledo

customer_reviews.title: tall dark and shelvey
customer_reviews.text: No idea how the boards that make up the shelving will stand up to being loaded down with books but they'll look good while doing it. Not sure what 'rubber wood' is but it's fairly heavy which makes me suspect that it's dense and somewhat strong. Either that or it's waterlogged and will sag like a noodle in six months. Oh well. It was cheap, looks good standing over there in the corner and went together easily enough. The pieces don't go together perfectly but it's a bit on the rustic side and that fitment seems in character.
customer_reviews.author: noirwestern

customer_reviews.title: Description says NO Assembly Required- don"t be fooled.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this primarily because the specifications said "Assembly Required.......... NO." Yet, surprise, surprise, surprise! There was an allen wrench and parts. My sister was able to get it together OK but we had planned on avoiding such steps needed.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Brady

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Using this as product display in salon. My only complaint is that the upper and lower sections are only connected in the back. I've tried moving it and grabbed the top section and the front separates. I'm not planning on moving it anymore so it should be no problem now. I get many compliments on it! It's exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly like photo!
customer_reviews.text: This came in and it was easy to assemble and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Biery

customer_reviews.title: Uneven, flimsy bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: This was very difficult to build. At the end, we found that the legs were all in the correct places and the top half of the shelf stands uneven on top of the bottom half. There is a gap between the legs and that led to the conclusion that the leg pieces are uneven. Very disappointing. It is very obvious too, but since that area of our room is dimly lit, we decided to keep the shelf. Taking it apart was just not worth it to us. You get what you pay for. This is a cheap shelf that looks good from afar. Very flimsy and light.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could ever have imagined
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf so much. It’s always a gamble to order furniture online, but we hit the jackpot on this one. Super easy to put together (less than 20 minutes) and it adds so much to the space. My only qualm is that it’s a little wider than expected, but that’s probably more a miscalculation on my part than it is a problem with the product. I will definitely be buying more of these the moment we move into a larger place. 10/10, will buy again 🙌
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn_G

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, poorly-made product; very costly return
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive this item but, as some other reviewers have noted, the bookcase is very poorly made. It is flimsy, the screw holes don't all match up, and there are noticeable gaps where the joints are supposed to join. Unhappy with the item, I tried to return it only to be informed that there's a 20% restocking fee and that I have to pay shipping for the item--all in all, it will probably cost at least half the original price just to return it. So, Amazon customers beware.
customer_reviews.author: TS

customer_reviews.title: Simply and easy assembly. Looks great.
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to put together and is a nice addition to the kitchen. I keep the 2 shelves on the bottom clear for kid purposes as my little ones like to climb and pull everything off anything in eye level and their arms reach. Lol
customer_reviews.author: AJS

customer_reviews.title: A nice addition to any room
customer_reviews.text: This was so incredibly easy to assemble. In 40 minutes I had the whole thing set up and covered in books. It does not feel filmsy. The holes were not drilled sloppily. They lined up perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: great for small spaces !
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small 700 square foot apartment so I needed something that would not be bulky in the living room. I Love, love, love this. Looks way more expensive than it is in person AND it was very very easy to put together alone. I would definitely consider buying this in other colors for other rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great liquor cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Shelving unit is perfect for a decently stocked liquor cabinet. As designed, the shelves are spaced far apart enough that you can put shorter handles on them. We drilled holes a few inches higher for the middle shelf and now even tall handles fit on the second to bottom shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This shelf ladder is beautiful! Its easy to assembly. I decided to get rid of my computer desk now that I’m not working at home to have more space in living room. I love that I can screw on the wall for stable.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Adekola

customer_reviews.title: The Directions made since but the hardware was missing
customer_reviews.text: only received half of the needed hardware to put the shelf together. had to go to ACE and buy additional hardware to build. Spent another 10.00 to get it to hold together. Difference between buying from amazon or ikea...the directions made since but the hardware was missing.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer gecho

customer_reviews.title: Great stylish, shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf for my bedroom, the espresso color matched perfectly with my bedset and the assembly wasn't too difficult. I was worried when I first opened the box and saw all the parts, but the diagram was easy to follow and I just needed a screwdriver. This shelf is very sturdy and stylish. I put books, a makeup holder, pictures, and other items on it and it's holding up very well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teryn

customer_reviews.title: The measurements are perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewer has pointed out, my top and bottom pieces do not match up and there is quite a gap on the front edge. The bookshelf bottom is also not even. I have it on terrazzo and it wobbles to the point I cannot put anything fragile on it, on carpeting it may not be as noticeable...? The measurements are perfect for what I needed, but without being sturdy I'm just don't believe it to be worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: vettechdt

customer_reviews.title: Great, but a few missing parts
customer_reviews.text: It's great, except that the package was missing 2 little brackets that hold the top and bottom halves of the assembly together, part RF40214. It's solid wood, not particle board, and looks nice. Mine is just held together by 4 wooden pins which are between the top and bottom portions, so I will need to find brackets.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg Lankin

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bookshelf is an absolute pile of crap. The instructions are lame and lacking detail. Ok, it's an easy geometric structure, IF ONLY the manufacture didn't mess up the screw holes and dowels! I spent far too much time trying to make this stupid thing straight and solid. It's a total piece of crap. I'm pissed and I'm declining the charge on my card. I tried to return it, but Amazon is being a jerk. I'm not taking this crap apart to send it back. This company sucks.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: It would be better if the sides were solid pieces vs sections. There is a gap in mine on one side because pieces weren't cut precisely where the sections connect. Besides that, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality
customer_reviews.text: For being the cheapest bookcases I could find, they are still pretty good quality. They were easy to assemble and they seem sturdy enough with all of our stuff on them. I also love the look!! I wanted latter bookcases and this was the perfect option!
customer_reviews.author: Jacki

customer_reviews.title: Cute shelf
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was easy to assemble. It isn't 100% stable because it has an uneven leg, so it wobbles slightly but that does not affect it's ability to display my decor. Overall it's a good shelf for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I unboxed it and was immediately intimidated. So many pieces and parts. The instructions made it soooo easy! Safe, stable, attractive
customer_reviews.author: Lady in the Harbor

product_meta.title: Casual Home 5-Shelf Ladder Bookcase, Espresso
product_meta.description: Style Name:Ladder Bookcase| Color:EspressoGentle slants and right angles make this Ladder Style Bookshelf an exciting alternative to your traditional rectangular bookcase. The 5 shelves retract in length as the bookcase ascends to accent your decor placement naturally. Complete your layout with a progressive piece that has classic features.
feature_bullets: 5 shelves of retracting lengths accentuate your décor with easy assembly
6-feet of height enclose ideal storage space for tall displays
Perfect for books, collectables, and more
Dimensions: 72 inches high x 24.75 inches wide x 16 inches deep; Weight: 25 pounds
NOTE : Kindly note that INSTALLATION MANUAL is available below for reference

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,070 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
